summary: I\'m putting together a bunch of different suits of armour and mage-wear that you\'ll be able to spawn ingame with console on your own. Instead of going to UESP.net and looking up all the individual parts for this process, I am typing them up on here for your ease.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=7]Spawn Crazy Enchanted Armour[/size][/center]

[center]I\'m doing this because I made myself some insane armour very easily.[/center]

I\'m putting together a bunch of different suits of armour and mage-wear that you\'ll be able to spawn ingame with console on your own. Instead of going to UESP.net and looking up all the individual parts for this process, I am typing them up on here for your ease. I searched a good hour or so and worked on getting myself some amazing dragonscale armour with the console command playerenchantobject <object ID> <MGEF ID> <MGEF ID> To make the job easier for you folks out there doing a lot of console tricks, I\'ll post a few sets of awesome enchanted armour. I will probably update this depending on how popular this gets. I don\'t have any files that I\'m posting, this is only a number of good enchanted items that you can spawn for yourself in game easier than going and finding all the parts on your own.

[b]Dragonscale set:[/b]

[u]Helmet:[/u]
playerenchantobject 13940 493aa 7a0fb
(Fortify Health 100 pts. Fortify Light Armour 100%)

[u]Armour:[/u] 
playerenchantobject 1393e 7a0f8 7a0fd
(Health Regen 100%. Magicka Regen 100%)

[u]Gaunlets:[/u]
playerenchantobject 1393f 7a0ff b7a35
(Fortify One Handed 100%. Magic Resist 100%)

[u]Boots:[/u]
playerenchantobject 1393d 49507 7a0f8
(Fortify Stamina 100 pts. Regen Health 100%)

[u]Shield:[/u]
playerenchantobject 13941 7a0f3 7a105
(Fortify block 100%. Regen Stamina 100%)



[b]Insane Mage robes, boots, gauntlets and hood:[/b]

[u]Mage hood:[/u]
playerenchantobject 10d6a7 b7a35 7a0fd
(Magic Resist 100%. Magicka Regen 100%)

[u]Monk Robes[/u]
playerenchantobject bacf3 b7a35 7a0f8
(Magic Resist 100%. Health Regen 100%)

[u]Dragonscale Gaunlets:[/u]
playerenchantobject 1393f 7a0fd b7a35
(Regen Magicka 100%. Magic Resist 100%)

[u]Dragonscale Boots:[/u]
playerenchantobject 1393d 49507 7a0f8
(Fortify Stamina 100 pts. Regen Health 100%)

[size=8]ENJOY![/size]
author: Hectoris
